transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, very good morning, main Minakshi bol rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir, Namaste, aapne hume call kiya tha. Aapke number se na hamare jo customer care number hai, usse call aaya tha sir. To aapke jo second
Customer: Haan sir?
Customer: Wo baat ho gaya, baat ho gaya tha.
Executive: To sir, koi problem aa rahi thi aapko?
Customer: Nahi wo dusra cheez ke liye hum phone kiya tha.
Executive: Bataye sir, kis cheez ke liye phone kiye the? Side mein help kar paun?
Customer: Wo ho gaya, wo madam ek to tha wo help kar diya.
Executive: Vibha mam, Vibha ne help kar diya aapka?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Sir, aise kya issue tha?
Customer: Iska issue nahi hai, hum ek jagah mein fasa tha na.
Executive: Aap ek jagah mein fasa ek jagah pe fase the?
Customer: 240 sun lijiye nahi jayega 240
Executive: Sir kya bol rahe hai aap?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had called regarding an issue.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the issue was resolved by Vibha.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, issue, help
